# stratEst 1.0.0
## Major changes
* introduces the S3 classes stratEst, stratEst.data, and stratEst.strategy
* new function stratEst.data() to reshape data.frame objects
* new function stratEst.simulate() to simulate data
* introduces the possibility to estimate models with samples specific parameters
* introduces a Firth penalty option for latent class regression models
* introduces the possibilty to fix trembles and coefficients

## Changes in function input and return objects
* adds stratEst() input object sample.id
* adds stratEst() input object quantiles
* adds stratEst() input object sample.specific
* adds stratEst() input object penalty
* adds stratEst() return objects with endings .par for estimated parameters
* adds stratEst() return object res.degrees
* adds stratEst() return object num.obs
* removes stratEst() input object cluster.id
* changes stratEst() input object select to character vector

## Bug fixes 
* bugfix for latent class regression with more than two strategies
* bugfix for unsorted data

# stratEst 0.1.2

* fixes a bug in the calculation of the score function for trembles
* fixes a bug in the selection procedure if the input object strategies is an integer
* contains the current working paper version


# stratEst 0.1.1

* fixes the overload ambiguity of the log() function in C++ code
* reports solutions with tremble parameters bigger than 0.5

# stratEst 0.1.0

* first release
